summary: This is an email from an unidentified sender to 'USANYS' (likely the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York) dated September 29, 2020, attaching documents related to a nolle prosequi filing in the Epstein case under reference EFTA00010327. The email's informal tone suggests it may be between legal professionals.

events.title: Nolle Prosequi Filing in Epstein Case
events.description: Documents related to a nolle prosequi (declination to prosecute) were filed in the Epstein case, referenced as EFTA00010327, and shared via email.

keyFacts: A nolle prosequi filing was made in the Epstein case on or around September 29, 2020.
The communication was directed to 'USANYS', likely the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The email included two attachments: 'Nolle letter.pdf' and 'Proposed_Nolle.pdf'.
The informal greeting ('Hi! Hope you're doing well') suggests correspondence between familiar parties, possibly legal counsel and prosecutors.
